ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the University of Nizwa, Nizwa, Sultanate of Oman, for providing laboratory and chemical facilities to conduct this project. We are also grateful to all laboratory staff members who are helped conduct this project. We thank Dr. Afaf Mohammed Weli, Associate Professor, College of Pharmacy and Nursing, University of Niza, for her kind help in correcting the manuscript.
